SEARCH
Package org.hms.entities

Class UserContext

java.lang.Object
org.hms.entities.UserContext
Direct Known Subclasses:
PatientContext
public class UserContext extends Object
The UserContext class provides a context containing essential user information. This class stores the user's name, role, and associated hospital ID.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private String
    hospitalID
    The unique identifier associated with the hospital to which the user is linked.

  • Field Details

    • name

      private String name
      The name of the user.

    • userRole

      private UserRole userRole
      Represents the role of the user within the context. The role can be one of the predefined values in the UserRole enum, indicating whether the user is a patient, doctor, pharmacist, or administrator.

    • hospitalID

      private String hospitalID
      The unique identifier associated with the hospital to which the user is linked.

  • Constructor Details

    • UserContext

      public UserContext(String name, UserRole userRole, String hospitalID)
      Constructs a new UserContext with the given user details.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the user
      userRole - the role of the user in the system
      hospitalID - the hospital ID associated with the user

  • Method Details

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Retrieves the name of the user.
      Returns:
      the name of the user

    • getUserType

      public UserRole getUserType()
      Retrieves the role of the user.
      Returns:
      the userRole, indicating the user's role within the system

    • getHospitalID

      public String getHospitalID()
      Retrieves the hospital ID associated with the current user context.
      Returns:
      the hospitalID of the current user
